command.name: addUser-s
command.short-description: Command to quickly add a user, just login and password,the rest of the information will be generated.
command.long-description:
[Description] Command to quickly add a user, just login and password, the rest of the information will be generated.
[Construction] addUser-s {login} {password}
{login} -> string {password} -> string
for example. addUsers-s admin 1234
